events.name: WOWZAPP 2012: Worldwide Hackathon for Windows -- Charlotte, USA
events.about:
Be part of the app revolution!

By registering, you’ll be joining thousands of developers worldwide as we build apps for the next generation of Windows.

Expert Help, Free Resources

Microsoft app experts, developers and trainers will be available on-site to assist your learning and coding. Learn about building Windows Store apps today – download the info, tools and resources you need now. 

Windows Azure Mobile Services

Does your Store app idea include cloud services or storage? Check out Get started withMobile Services –registered student WOWZAPP 2012 participants are eligible for a FREE temporary student Windows Azure subscription!– supplies are limited so be sure to register now!

Get Ready for Wowzapp

  • Learn: 30 to Launch, Tips and Tricks for Windows 8 app & game development
  • Learn: Windows 8 Camp in a Box - hands-on labs, samples and resources
  • Download: Windows 8 RTM (90-day Evaluation)
  • Download: Visual Studio Express 2012
  • Trial: Windows Azure 90-day trial
events.address: College of Human and Health Services Building, RM 161 8940 Michael Ray Craver Road

events.name: Charlotte Startup Weekend
events.about: Startup Weekend is an intense 54 hour event which focuses on building a web or mobile application which could form the basis of a credible business over the course of a weekend. The weekend brings together people with different skill sets - primarily software developers, graphics designers and business people - to build applications and develop a commercial case around them.
